t: About US State Sales and Use Taxes - Amazon Customer Service
s: The tax rate applied to your order will be the combined state and local rates of the address where your order is delivered to or fulfilled from. For example, if you live in a state that does not impose a sales tax, you may still see tax calculated on your order if shipped to another state.

s: December 13, 2023 - Make sure the trademark status ... United States Patent and Trademark Office (USPTO) before applying. Brands with trademarks that are not active will not be approved. Link to the TESS: https://www.uspto.gov/trademark · If you are planning on enrolling more than 10 brands, only fill out one application and make sure to select “Yes” ...

t: Brand Stores: Create a brand page on Amazon for free | Amazon Ads
